header.xliffext:poisonError: Handback file name: lo-mt_reference.98c0d140d9985431353fdc81a36c1cca81c53540.zh-cn is different with handoff file name: reference.98c0d140d9985431353fdc81a36c1cca81c53540.zh-cn.

trans-unit.source: /reference (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
/reference (Visual Basic)
Causes the compiler to make type information in the specified assemblies available to the project you are currently compiling.
trans-unit.target: 使编译器将在指定的程序集的类型信息提供给当前正在编译项目。

trans-unit.source: Syntax
Arguments
Term
Definition
Required.
Comma-delimited list of assembly file names.
trans-unit.target: 程序集文件名称的以逗号分隔列表。

trans-unit.source: If the file name contains a space, enclose the name in quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件名包含空格，则将名称括在引号内。

trans-unit.source: Remarks
The file(s) you import must contain assembly metadata.
trans-unit.target: 在导入的文件必须包含程序集元数据。

trans-unit.source: Only public types are visible outside the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 仅将公共类型是在程序集外部可见的。

trans-unit.source: The [/addmodule](../../../visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/addmodule.md) option imports metadata from a module.
If you reference an assembly (Assembly A) which itself references another assembly (Assembly B), you need to reference Assembly B if:
trans-unit.target: 如果引用的程序集 （程序集 A） 其本身引用另一个程序集 (程序集 B)，如果需要引用程序集 B:

trans-unit.source: A type from Assembly A inherits from a type or implements an interface from Assembly B.
trans-unit.target: 程序集 A 中的类型继承自的类型或实现程序集 B 中的接口

trans-unit.source: A field, property, event, or method that has a return type or parameter type from Assembly B is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 字段、 属性、 事件或程序集 B 中的返回类型或形参类型的方法被调用。

trans-unit.source: Use [/libpath](../../../visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/libpath.md) to specify the directory in which one or more of your assembly references is located.
trans-unit.target: 使用[/libpath](../../../visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/libpath.md)若要指定一个或多个程序集引用所在的目录。

trans-unit.source: For the compiler to recognize a type in an assembly (not a module), it must be forced to resolve the type.
trans-unit.target: 编译器无法识别出的程序集 （而不是模块） 的类型，必须将它强制要解析的类型。

trans-unit.source: One example of how you can do this is to define an instance of the type.
trans-unit.target: 如何执行此操作的一个示例是定义类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: Other ways are available to resolve type names in an assembly for the compiler.
trans-unit.target: 其他方法是可用于解析编译器的程序集中的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you inherit from a type in an assembly, the type name then becomes known to the compiler.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您从程序集中的类型继承，类型名称则将成为已知给编译器。

trans-unit.source: The Vbc.rsp response file, which references commonly used [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](../../../csharp/getting-started/includes/dnprdnshort_md.md)] assemblies, is used by default.
trans-unit.target: Vbc.rsp 响应文件引用常用[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](../../../csharp/getting-started/includes/dnprdnshort_md.md)]程序集，默认情况下使用。

trans-unit.source: Use `/noconfig` if you do not want the compiler to use Vbc.rsp.
trans-unit.target: 使用`/noconfig`如果不希望使用 Vbc.rsp 的编译器。

trans-unit.source: The short form of `/reference` is `/r`.
Example
The following code compiles source file I`nput.vb` and reference assemblies from M`etad1.dll` and M`etad2.dll` to produce O`ut.exe`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码编译源代码文件我`nput.vb`和引用程序集从 M`etad1.dll`和 M`etad2.dll`以生成 O`ut.exe`。
